OpenCurric — An AI-Curated Curriculum Builder

An open platform where: • Students can generate personalized learning pathways for any subject • Content is pulled from open educational resources, adapted and sequenced by AI • Includes quizzes, interactive explanations, and progress tracking

  • Helps students who can’t access tutoring or structured learning
  • Great for homeschoolers, under-resourced schools, or autodidacts
  • Fully free & remixable (like open-source education)
